com.ihealth.communication.control

Class BPControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.BPControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class BPControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for Continua BP

    The class provides methods to control Continua BP. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a Continua BP, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new Continua BP, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect Continua BP.

    A iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) callback is triggered to report the memory. Action : ACTION_HISTORY_DATA_CBP Example:{"bp_unit":0,"bp_timestampflag":1,"bp_pulserateflag":1,"bp_useridflag":1,"bp_measurestatusflag":1,"bp_hsdflag":0,"bp_sys":119,"bp_dia":76,"bp_map":0,"bp_timestamp":"2015-1-1 1:0:0","bp_pulserate":78,"bp_userid":1,"bp_body_movement":0,"bp_cufffit":0,"bp_irregular":0,"bp_pulseraterange":0,"bp_position":0,"bp_hsd":0}

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

      • setTime

        public void setTime()
        set time for Continua Bp device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If operation successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_SET_TIME_CBP
          • The message is null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getBattery

        public void getBattery()
        get battery of Continua Bp device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_CBP
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getFeature

        public void getFeature()
        get the feature of Continua Bg device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get the feature of Continua Bg device successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_FEATURE_CBP
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • commandSetUser

        public void commandSetUser(int UserID)
        set current user.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set current user successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_CONFORM_CHOOSE_USER_CBP
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getData

        public void getData()
        get the data of the current user.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get the data of the current user successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_HISTORY_DATA_CBP
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect the ContinueBP.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If disconnect device successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID, Map manufactorData)
          • The status is iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DeviceControl

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface DeviceControl
